structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Trailer, semitrailer, mobile home or recreational vehicle last registered in another state.
law.text: A trailer, semitrailer, mobile home or recreational vehicle last registered in another state and purchased by a person for operation in this state shall be first registered in this state by and in the name of the purchaser and not in the name of the seller.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 395, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 3, effective January 1, 1957.
